thread.title: Great place for a Broadway trip
thread.title_full: Great place for a Broadway trip - Review of Distrikt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Erik S
title: Great place for a Broadway trip
text: The Distrikt was a great base for my recent tip with a friend to see a few shows in NYC. It's close enough to the Theater District to be convenient, while being *just* out of the way enough to be more affordable. The rooms are chic and comfortable, and the ground floor features a cozy (and relatively inexpensive) bar/cafe. The walk to any of the major theaters is literally minutes, and it's only a slightly longer walk to Penn Station. In addition, the front desk staff, including Faye, clearly take guest appreciation and satisfaction very seriously. They've become my new go-to hotel in the area.
